address: 4000 MacArthur Blvd Ste 655, Newport Beach, CA 92660
valueProp:
Talkov Law Corp. is a California professional corporation specializing in partition actions and co-ownership disputes. The firm has a team of experienced attorneys who handle over 260 partition actions throughout California. They provide legal services to clients in Los Angeles, Orange County, San Francisco, Riverside, San Diego, San Jose, Sacramento, Fresno, and surrounding areas.

Talkov Law is dedicated to helping clients resolve real estate co-ownership disputes through court-ordered partition actions. With a focus on efficiency and effectiveness, the firm aims to provide clients with the best possible outcome in a timely manner. The attorneys at Talkov Law have a strong track record of success in handling partition actions and ensuring that clients receive the equity they are owed.
